name: DEADLY WHEELS
description:
"Deadly wheels" - simulator of the race for survival.

You are expected to:
  • two fascinating locations;
  • a wide range of cars with unique characteristics;
  • weapons for every taste;
  • a bright and memorable low-poly design;

Get your car. Select a card. Start the fight!

Pick up weapons during the battle and shoot at opponents! Earn "kills" points.
You can spend your "kills" points on buying new cars.
